original_text: While they were wondering about this, suddenly two men in clothes that gleamed like lightning stood beside them.
korean_text: 이로 인하여 근심할 때에 문득 찬란한 옷을 입은 두 사람이 곁에 섰는지라

sentences.original_text: While they were wondering about this
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이것에 대해 놀라고 있는 동안

sentences.original_text: in clothes that gleamed like lightning
